casebody.data:
UTSTARCOM, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. STARENT NETWORKS CORP., Defendant-Appellee. No. 2006-1295. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 6, 2007.

Before BRYSON, Circuit Judge, CLEVENGER, Senior Circuit Judge, and LINN, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R.36
